markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />envision (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, visual);     **Effect** You force a creature looking at the mirror to attempt an additional Will save against the mirror’s fascination effect, even if they succeeded at their save.
name: envision (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, visual)
